test.name: TC1: Login with valid email and password

kw.name: Run Keywords
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Login with ${valid_email} and ${valid_password}
kw.source_name: Login with ${username} and ${password}

kw.name: Fill in the Email or CPF field with ${username}
kw.source_name: Fill in the Email or CPF field with ${username}

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Fill in the Password field with ${password}
kw.source_name: Fill in the Password field with ${password}

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Check if you were redirected to the homepage
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
